Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” and “Adult Years.” While giving audiences an interesting visual introduction to the ideological struggle between Communists and Fascists that shocked Japan during World War II, director Hagiwara Kenji divides his picture into several separate passages of poetry by Miyazawa.<|end_of_text|>
